programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Flop teaches Bing and Pando how to blow bubbles. Bing finally blows a big bubble but gets upset when Pando pops it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: During Bing’s bedtime routine he inadvertently pees on his blankie and it’s too wet to wash and dry before bed. Fortunately his Hoppity Voosh toy has a cape just as soft and huggy as blankie and it even smells just right too.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Flop jump. When Bing tries out his new tricks on Charlie he finds out the power of Boo has to be scaled down for babies.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Molly’s wool that she just bought disappeared! She’s sure that it must have been stolen, so Tilda and Rupert found the Appleseed Detective Agency. Are the friends going to catch the burglar?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert finds out that Molly has a beautiful singing voice and asks her if she can sing a song for Tildas birthday. Molly absolutely wants to do this but can she overcome her stage fright?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda launches an herbal delivery service, and demand is huge. But Billy and Benny mix up orders: now Rupert cant sleep, and Robin sleeps through his morning song. Tilda must fix the chaos.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After a long quiet winter in the meadow Little Nutbrown hare announces that he can’t wait for winter to be over so he can enjoy the other seasons with their special treats to see, hear and taste. Will the sound of icicles tinkling in the wind, the taste of a frozen Winter berry and some very unusual tracks in the snow convince the little hare that Winter is just as special as the other seasons?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare follows some unusual tracks in the snow that eventually lead him to a shy little spotty deer. He plays with his new friend every day, until she has to leave again with her mother to search for food. Little Nutbrown Hare is sad to see her go, but he’s also glad that he has friends that stay in the meadow all year round.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The snow in the meadow is so deep that Little Nutbrown Hare has to stay under the Old Oak tree. Wondering what he is going to do all day in deep snow and with no one to play with, his imagination soon takes over as he creates new kinds of fun. By the time his friends reach him, Little Nutbrown Hare can’t believe how the time has flown!

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Wilson is trying for his Fire Warden badge and is thrilled to be given his own siren. When the fire alarm goes off, he must sound his siren and make sure everybody leaves the area safely. Wilson gets a little carried away practising and doesn’t hear when the real alarm goes off. He is given another chance and this time concentrates and takes his responsibilities very seriously. When the alarm goes off during the night, he is able to evacuate the chuggers from the roundhouses quickly and calmly.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kai is struggling against the wind as he plods across the sandy, snowy dunes of the Gobi Desert. He gets impatient and tries to fly above with his hover boots but the wind was too strong, causing him to crash back on the sand dune. Kai then stumble upon an injured Bactrian Camel, with its leg being hurt. Back in the garden, Leo And Katie are playing Simon Says. Their game is cut short when Kai calls on Leos watch. After explaining the situation, the Junior Rangers agrees to help and travel to meet with Kai. Once they arrive, Leo is surprised how cold the environemnt is. Katie gives him an extra scarf and gloves. The Junior Rangers then meet up with Kai and the camel has a large rock stuck in its toes. Kai has an idea to use his grabber. Katie holds the leg as Leo tries to distract the animal while Kai pulls the rock out. Kai manages to success pull it out and Katie immediately disinfact the camels foot. The Junior Rangers then wants to reunite camel with its caravan, and they follow the camel who has already walk away. It was troubling for the Junior Rangers as the sand dune is hard to manuever. Katie has an idea to use their jetpack which Kai informs her its not a good idea.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kai is operating his drone to film for his film of the underwater environment. He recorded some fish but none are interesting to him. Then he encounters a starfish that piques his interest and think its the great subject for his film. Back in the garden, Katie are sketching Leo on her notepad as Leo poses. He moves as a fly keeps bugging him, making Katie irritated. Leo then receives a call from Kai who explain of the animal he discover. After learning more about it in the treehouse, the Junior Rangers agree to meetup with Kai in the ocean. Once they arrive, Kai instruct Leo And Katie to act around the starfish but theyre acting was bad. Kai films the starfish but it keeps doing nothing so he fall asleep while Leo and Katie are playing with Hero who is playing with a seashell. As Kai wakes up, they get greeted by Ranger Rocky. The Junior Rangers explain the situations causing him to call for Ranger Joey for more information on the animal. After learning useful tips, they found that the starfish had disappeared and later got carried away in a plastic bag stuck in by a sea turtle. Ranger Rocky manages to distract the sea turtle and Leo grab the plastic with his grabber. The starfish falls over and slowly fall over and reunite with other starfish. The day are saved and the Junior Rangers goes home. Back in the garden, Leo sees the sketch that Katie finished.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Nina is sure that her dog Loupiote is the fastest animal around! But T’choupi believes Brocoli the goat can move even faster! Nina rises to the challenge, and before you know it, Loupiote and Brocoli are unknowingly competing with each other in a race! But the dog and goat do whatever they please. And when Ciboulette the cat gets involved, it’s all downhill from there!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi loves eating Fred’s goat’s cheese… but thinks again after getting a whiff of the goats’ pen: Ew!... So he’s very happy when Nina suggests they clean it out! Once they’re done with the cleaning, the two friends decide they could also make it more cozy. But shhh, not a word to anyone: it’s a surprise! However, after making the pen all spic and span and super comfortable, they’re shocked to find that the smell is still there!?! Thinking he’s found the perfect solution, Tchoupi sprays Mom’s perfume inside the pen… But what do the goats’ think of this new scent inside their house…?

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While out walking in the forest, Benedicte sets a challenge for Tchoupi and Nina – to find their way back home all by themselves, using landmarks they come across along the way. But when they spot a squirrel, they momentarily forget to pay attention, and stray from the path back home...

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Daisy, the school’s assistant, has broken her leg and must stay at home. To help her feel better, the teacher has a very original idea for a present: a video with all the pupils! Unfortunately, when facing the camera, most of the children don’t know what to do with themselves… With the exception of Louis, who proves to be quite a natural!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam is passionately reading a book. But Julia accidentally damages the last few pages of it. How Julia could she reinvent for her friend the end of the interrupted story to calm Sams frustration?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia is impressed by Sarah, Sams older sister, who is preparing to sing on the theater stage. Julia does everything to attend the rehearsals but its not always easy to get noticed by a big girl.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Miss Gossip wants to write an article about Julia, as a recent inhabitant. The journalist needs informations about her island, from a book that belong to Julias mother, so not to be loosed...

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Emily worries she doesnt have a best friend, but, when the other engines help her out of a tricky situation, she realises shes been surrounded by best friends all along.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas befriends a stray dog who is wandering around the railway and tries to find him a home. In the process, Thomas derails and the fuzzy little dog raises the alarm.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou has to join a new class for the day, and hes mega nervous! He imagines his new, temporary classmates as Aliens on a new planet. While at first he feels lonely, over the course of the day Caillou makes anew friend, River, and realizes the new class isnt so scary after all!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: When Caillou goes first for Show And Tell and needs to use the "How Am I Feeling" Board to express his emotions, its confusing at first, but as he recounts the story of his Grandmas birthday, he finds that no matter how you feel, you can always choose kindness.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When Huckle and the gang hear strange mumbling voices in the Busytown Museum, it begins to look like it’s coming from the new Mummy Exhibit. However, after tracking down the clues and putting them together, the sounds turn out to be the voices of the workmen echoing up through air vents from the basement.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: The chef Monkey wants to make his famous banana honey sandwich. He discovers that there is no honey, parrot eat it all. Mole appears and tells them of the bees honey making abilities. They journey off to the meadow where they meet a sweet honeybee who not only supplies them with honey, but also joins them in a fun game of Monkey See Monkey Do!!!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: During a search and rescue drill on Annie’s Farm, Penny and Annie’s childhood rivalry leads to a heated game of hide and seek, a runaway horse, and a river rescue on board Hydrus and Phoenix.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy leads a whirlwind tour of the Seven Wonders of Pontypandy, but her haste to make it to all seven leads to a fire at her campsite!

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: While doing their “Who’s Who in Woodland” project - a school assignment where the kids have to find out more about the people in their community - Franklin and Bear assume they already know all there is to know about Mr. Groundhog. But in doing so they almost miss out on a bunch of cool stuff, like the fact he’s actually Woodland’s own expert weatherman! / When Franklin and Fox decide they want to be inventors just like Mr. Fox, they find that tinkering and experimenting are just as important to the process as following a plan. With open minds, they even invent some pretty cool gadgets along the way!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Edmond lives happily with his three little badger cubs in their underground sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Marguerite and her daughter move into the family home, turning life upside-down for everyone, who now needs to find a new way to live together in harmony.Directed by: Florian Ferrier (France, 2018)

programme.title: Doodleboo

programme.title: Doodleboo

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What do you need for a great birthday? Doodleboo explains how to draw a birthday cake.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave harvest the hay down on the farm. They have to keep counting and checking their nine bales of hay to ensure they are all safely put away in the barn before it rains - and a fun harvest song helps them remember how many bales they should have!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty’s garden is in a messy muddle and he wants to know ‘why’? Hatty always tidies his things away, but today there’s a pumpkin on the path and tools and sticks scattered all around the garden! It’s up to Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave to clean up, putting everything back in its proper place, and solve the ‘Mystery of the Messy Muddler’.

When Little White Owl hears it calling one night, she tells them all that the ‘lucky chick’ is a baby owl and she will teach her all an owl needs to know.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You

They leave a trail of acorns to find their way home, but Little Grey Squirrel unwittingly collects the acorns and leaves them all lost in the woods. Luckily he is able to help when he climbs to the treetops and spies the meadow in the distance.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: At Ammas crèche a butterfly lands on Sulas painting. Bing tries to help it go outside but accidentally squishes it. Flop and Amma help the sad children say goodbye.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The playful rabbit wants to draw a big picture, so Flop finds him some chalk to create a stripy, spotty, zig-zag dinosaur on the pavement

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula find a potato in Amma’s vegetable patch with a comical ‘face’, so they take it under their wing, naming it “Nosey”. The two children look after Nosey and show him around the crèche but unfortunately Nosey goes down the slide too quickly and his ‘nose’ falls off. Amma shows them how to plant both bits of potato so that they can grow new potatoes.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On Reggie Squirrel’s seventh birthday, he couldnt find his friends at home. He runs into Harry Hedgehog, who offers to take him for a ride in a carriage. When they return, the forest inhabitants celebrate Reggie Squirrel together, giving him seven candles as a gift. They then fly in a hot air balloon, marveling at the night sky. Finally, Reggie Squirrel happily returns home and wishes his friends a good night.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Bubble and Stanley gather chestnuts, and then they create marvelous figures out of them at the house of the stag beetle. Bubble takes the figures home, but upon seeing the mess, Stanley offers his help. In the process, they get caught up in a series of accidents, resulting in the gingerbread house breaking. Bubble receives a new gingerbread house from Rosita the rose beetle and happily tidies up his room.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The green Grub wants to stay with Dolly for the winter, but always finds her at the wrong time with the request. The Wind accidentally blows the The Green Grub to the seaside, then brings it back to Dolly. Finally, Dolly happily welcomes the Green Grub for the winter and prepares a comfortable bed for him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 05 Mepe
programme.desc: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They have many adventures, while they make new friends and get knowledge about the world around them.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids search for the owner of a sketchbook that contains drawings done from a high point of view. After determining the artist wasnt drawing at the top of a ladder or up in a tree, they discover the sketchbook belongs to one of Busytowns tallest residents, Jeremy Giraffe. / Huckle and gang investigate a strange temperature drop which turns Busytowns summer to winter.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: It is nap time at the campsite but monkey cant fall asleep so he is walking back and forth counting his footsteps. Monkey hopes that Bear can help him fall asleep so they venture over to the tundra. There they meet a young Grizzly bear cub who too has problems going to sleep. Bear joins them for a fun game of Monkey See Monkey Do!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When filming a tourism advert about Pontypandy, Sarah gets carried away with her filming. When she climbs a mountain to get the perfect shot, she ends up stranded on a ledge. Meanwhile Elvis decides it would be a good idea to set up a souvenir stall selling jars of Pontypandy Firefighter Pickles.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Peter creates a wild and adventurous trail for Scoop Dooley to follow, they both end up getting lost. Meanwhile, when Radar destroys Shadow’s favourite toy, Sergeant Ravani and Sam work hard to fix it!

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper, Tiger and Jake are having a day on the river. It takes ages to do up their lifejackets and Tiger loses his cap. Jake rows them in a circle and Tiger does a special knot to tie the boat up when they stop for lunch but it comes undone and the boat drifts away. By the end of the day they are glad to be back on dry land.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper is waiting for Pig and Arnold at the duck pond when a small friendly robot clanks out of the water. At Kipper’s house it tries a piece of bread, a milk shake and some chocolate cookies but when Kipper introduces Hippo, to his horror, the robot eats him too! Happily Kipper and Hippo are reunited at the duck pond.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi spots a baby rabbit at the edge of the garden. Taking pity on this lone animal, he decides he wants to keep it. So he introduces it to Plume and Plumeau, hoping they’ll all play together. But despite his good intentions, T’choupi realizes before long that you can’t just invite any random guest into your home…

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Nina and Dad have fun imitating birdsongs and are very good at it. Tchoupi, however, is totally unable to join in: singing like a bird isn’t his forte! Frustrated, he suggests they play hide And seek in the forest instead. Nina’s fine with it… as long as they do a "special kind of hide And seek," using birdsongs to find each other! T’choupi opts for the simplest song of all: a cuckoo, with its characteristic "kookoo" greeting: Kookoo, kookoo!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Grandma Gouda challenges a timid Sam to tell a story in front of an audience at the next party she hosts. How could he overcome his stage fright. Julia has some ideas to help her friend...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Invited to dinner at Sams house, Julia makes a stain on the tablecloth while Sams mom is away. Time is running : can Sam and Julia wash the stain and fix Julias big mistake before the dinner?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert builds soapbox cars, and Billy and Benny race them excitedly. Edna thinks its too dangerous and secures the track, while Karl and Molly struggle with near-sightedness and fear.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are quietly playing cards on the top bunk and Turbulent is taking all the place, which annoys Girl and Poet. Turbulent replies that if theyre unhappy, they can leave HIS bed! For Turbulent, his bed is a dungeon and you can only enter with the right imaginary ticket ! To get even with him, Girl and Poet decide to make their bed become an hotel and a restaurant in THEIR bed. And Turbulent is not welcome. Nobody is happy with their place anymore. Mommy will have to find a clever way to close the argument.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Today Poet is sick, he can’t go to school and Mommy decides to prepare him a good hot milk with honey. Girl and Turbulent are so jealous and they wonder if Poet would not be Mommy’s favorite! Once they come home from school, they even find Poet in Mommy’s bed: there is no doubt anymore, he is her favorite! They decide to take a drastic decision, they will leave the house, let Mommy and Poet alone and they will regret it. But Mommy has a solution of her own to put an end to this conflict.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Edmond lives happily with his three little badger cubs in their underground sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Marguerite and her daughter move into the family home, turning life upside-down for everyone, who now needs to find a new way to live together in harmony.Directed by: Florian Ferrier (France, 2018)

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Mommy comes down with the Sniffle-Diffles and is unable to take Caillouand Rosie to the fair, so they decide to "make her better," with thehelp of Nurse Daddy. In the end, they forget all about the fair, havingso much fun helping Mommy.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: On a super hot day, Caillou and Leo competitively play a lava level ofDig n Build. When Daddy tries plugging in a fan, he ends upoverloading the circuits, turning the TV and game off! As Leo andCaillou swelter in the heat, they begin to imagine lava rising in thehouse. They learn to work together to help save Gilbert from the lavaand get their game (and the AC) back on!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Philip shows off to James about how many trucks he can pull, James decides to prove that he is the stronger engine by pulling a very long train. Soon disaster strikes as James can’t control all of the trucks and comes off the rails breaking through the side of a stone bridge. Philip races to save James and the brave little engine slips under James to rescue his new friend from falling and props him up until help arrives.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Cormac loves to be busy, but when a problem at the docks means there are no deliveries, he finds himself at a loose end. He drives all over Chuggington offering his help but nobody needs him. He wanders into Chug Patrol HQ, but nobody is there. Cormac jumps when an emergency call from Jackman suddenly comes through. The Chug Patrollers have gone up the mountain to practise search and rescue techniques but the weather has turned stormy and lightning has split a rock, trapping them. Cormac yells that he’s on his way. Finally he has a job to do!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Harrison wants to be a tour guide, but first he must pass the test: devising a special tour. He plans to go around his favourite parts of Chuggington, but needs a special place to end his tour. While searching, Harrison discovers working parts of Chuggington that he’s never seen before, but doesn’t find his special place. Time is running out and a dusty Harrison rushes back to the Working Wheels Yard for a wash but they are too busy to fit him in. Harrison is distraught. He cant give a tour looking like this!

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Daisy, the school’s assistant, has broken her leg and must stay at home. To help her feel better, the teacher has a very original idea for a present: a video with all the pupils! Unfortunately, when facing the camera, most of the children don’t know what to do with themselves… With the exception of Louis, who proves to be quite a natural!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: In an exciting game of opposites, Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave discover that "opposite" means ‘most different, and explore pairs of words that describe opposite states and actions.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are excited to be looking after a guest - a friend’s "unique" rooster by the name of Rigoletto. They ask Fred what makes it so unique but he’s not sure; all he knows is that they need to take good care of it. However, despite being housed in its very own enclosure, Rigoletto escapes and goes missing!! Huh! Maybe the animal’s "uniqueness" will allow the kids to track it down…?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah was driving her dirt bike but she stops as she hears a loud cries, grabbing her attention. She investigate and finds a baby moon bear crying for help. Back in the garden, Katie and Leo are playing tag. Leo blocks Katies path to touch Hero but Katie manages to tricks him. But Hero manages to escape as he was distracted by a butterfly. Suddenly, Farah calls for help through Leos watch, informing them of the poor animal cub with her. After the Junior Rangers learn that its a Moon Bear cub and wanting to help, they travel to meet up with Farah by riding PlatypusOne. Once theyre there, Farah tells them she has name the cub Cubby. Katie then reads her tablet and says that moon bear need to learn how to climb trees, swim, mark territories and communicate with other bears to survive, hence a montage happens of the Junior Rangers. Then they try teaching Cubby how to growl like a bear so they all imitate bear growling. Cubby gives it a try but struggle to do it. Ranger Rocky randomly appears and the Junior Rangers tells him of their situation. Ranger Rocky decides to call out his dear friend Ranger Joey and asks for help.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: In April, the Pigeon post brings the ants a bouncy castle. Its Dr Owls task to invite everyone for the jumping session, but Berry is nowhere to be found. Hail interrupts the jumping fun, but the friends seek shelter in the ant castle. The toy gets damaged, but with the help of a cloud, Berry can also join the jumping. Then the ants rebuild the castle, and everyone happily continues jumping.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Balthazar and Stanley are building a raft that gets carried away by the stream. They end up far from home, but then decide to head back during a storm. Christopher, the canary helps them, but they fall off during a gust of wind. They find refuge in a hollow to rest where they are finally discovered and helped to go home by the Spider. The next day, they play along the stream again, but they no longer worry if the raft run away.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Flutter, the butterfly girl, tries to bake an apple pie, but unfortunately, it doesnt turn out well. With the help of a fairy, she manages to fix it and then finds a lost marker and repairs the window as well. The Lily Fairy discovers that Flutter solved everything on her own and then moves on to help others.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, invites Bubble, Berry, and Dolly for a visit. They make ice cream and play together. Bubble admits to cheating in the game. Because of this, the little friends come up with a new game where everyone can win."

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the forest gather on the hilltop to watch the evening meteor shower. Stanley and Balthazar want to build a seesaw but constantly encounter obstacles. The Firefly helps them, and with the assistance of the Moon, they swing on the Moon rocker seesaw. The meteor shower mesmerizes them, then they bid farewell to each other, and everyone starts heading home. The Firefly falls asleep contentedly.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing the talking lettuce game on Flops phone when he drops the phone and accidentally breaks it

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends put on a show in the park. After Coco’s dance, Pando’s song and Sula’s acrobatics display everyone is excited to see Bing’s finale. When he gets up on the stage Bing is overcome with stage fright so his friends, and rainbow fairy mice, come to the rescue.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing tries to show Sula she doesnt need to wear earmuffs to watch the fireworks but when a loud bang sends Bing flying, he doesnt think they are such a bad idea!

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters
programme.desc: Get to know our little pets better through charming stories featuring the characters from the popular Bing series.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon and his family are spending the weekend at Grandma and Grandpas, but Simon is finding that he has to do lots of things around the house while Gaspard doesnt do anything!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Edmond lives happily with his three little badger cubs in their underground sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Marguerite and her daughter move into the family home, turning life upside-down for everyone, who now needs to find a new way to live together in harmony.Directed by: Florian Ferrier (France, 2018)

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is impressed by Blue Bird’s description of a flowery field that looks just like a sea of colour from her bird’s eye view. He visits the field with Big Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse, and they discover that everyone has their own unique view of the field, and each one is special in its own way.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One gorgeous Summer morning Big Nutbrown Hare wakes to find Little Nutbrown Hare enthralled by a story of Little White Owl’s. Encouraged, Little Nutbrown Hare sets off to make up a story of his own, but finds it harder than he thought to come up with one. With the help of his father, he finally uses some fruit he’s collected on the way to help him tell a very colourful tale.

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Its snowing at last! Boribon goes sledding with Annalee. They have a snowball fight and build a snowman - and the snowman goes home with them. How is this possible?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: The triplets are hard to put to sleep. Just as hard as Sams dad was! says Grandma. The only thing that used to put him to sleep was an old mobile, but its completely out of order...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia dreams of joining the residences brass band, except that to do so, she must come with a musical instrument. Sam builds one for her, but Julia is too impatient to listen at her friends advice.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: When her little girl says she wants to become a doctor, mom tells her that it takes a lot of work. Surely enough, Girl decides to start training right away, with her first aid kit. Poet and Turbulent are her first patients, but the two boys are quite annoyed by their consultation. Girl tries to heal Toto and finally her teddy bears but they too seem rather ungrateful. So how about becoming a doll doctor?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The triplets are enjoying a day at the beach with their mom. Unfortunately, Girl starts having the hiccups and cannot get rid of it, despite her brothers many tricks and advice. Strangely enough, a seagull is finally going to cure her...But guess who has the hiccups now?

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Tyne tunnels through the mountain, while the rest of the chuggineers are hard at work finishing a bridge for the new high - speed link to Tootington. Just as Tyne is about to break through, Brewster averts disaster by spotting that a track joint hasn’t been welded. Zack gets it done in the nick of time and Tyne and the tunnel - boring machine drive safely out onto the new bridge. As a gesture of appreciation, Zack names the bridge after Brewster.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When filming a tourism advert about Pontypandy, Sarah gets carried away with her filming. When she climbs a mountain to get the perfect shot, she ends up stranded on a ledge. Meanwhile Elvis decides it would be a good idea to set up a souvenir stall selling jars of Pontypandy Firefighter Pickles.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Peter creates a wild and adventurous trail for Scoop Dooley to follow, they both end up getting lost. Meanwhile, when Radar destroys Shadow’s favourite toy, Sergeant Ravani and Sam work hard to fix it!

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper is excited when he looks out and sees snow. He practises sledging with Big Owl before he and Tiger go to the snowy park. They watch the ducks skidding on the icy pond and realise they can’t any food when the water’s frozen over. Kipper and Tiger come to the rescue with a sledge full of bread.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Jake seems to be playing with someone Kipper and Tiger can’t see. When Jake introduces Wilbur to them, Kipper and Tiger feel they should pretend to see him too. By the time they’ve all has ice cream and lemonade no one is sure whether Wilbur exists or not.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: When Caillou’s friends mistakenly think that his dad is a treasure hunter, Caillou feels very special until Ms. Martin invites Daddy to visit his class. Unsure what to do, Caillou pretends to be an explorer whose assistant (Daddy) must learn to be honest in order to find the treasure.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D) Mepe
programme.desc: Caillou wants his cold to go away immediately so he can play pirates with his friends. But when he goes into a pirate captain fantasy and rushes though his ship’s repairs instead of taking the time to fix it properly, he realizes how important it is to be patient with his own body.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: In an attempt to beat Thomas in a race, Cleo decides to use the railway lines instead of the road. She soon learns that the roads are much safer for a little car.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: On the vibrant shores of an Indonesian island, Kai embarks on a thrilling adventure with his revolutionary Kaizer Drone, equipped with a cutting-edge animal translator capable of converting dolphin squeals into human speech. Later, he stumbles upon a mysterious whale that bore an uncanny resemblance to a fearsome shark. Meanwhile, in a nearby garden, Leo and Katie engage in training sessions with their loyal canine companion, Hero, using a bag of delectable animal treats to hone his communication skills. Amidst Heros baffling barks, Leo receives an urgent call from Kai, who unveils his astonishing discovery. Captivated by the intrigue, Katie and Leo agree to rendezvous with Kai when they learn that the magnificent whale shark has become ensnared in a fishing net. As the Junior Rangers arrive at Kais location, clad in their sleek wetsuits, they confront the sight of the majestic creature helplessly entangled. Contemplating the potential risks of liberating a shark, they find solace in the sudden arrival of Ranger Rocky, who imparts words of caution. Seeking expert advice, the Junior Rangers connect with Ranger Joey, who enlightens them on the harmless nature of the whale shark. After bidding farewell to Ranger Rocky, they summon their courage and attempt to free the captive creature.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah was bird gazing in the rainforest, to which then she hears a birdcall from an unknown bird. She finally locates it and sees a unique male Superb Bird of Paradise, in the middle of doing its courting dance. Fascinated, Farah plans to call the Junior Rangers in learning more. Back in the garden, Leo And Katie are having a friendly dancing competition. Hero joins them for a moment before Leo receives a call from Farah. Farah shares the bird picture to them and they learned its a Superb Bird of Paradise. They then worried if the bird might be injured so the Junior Rangers agree in meeting with Farah. The Junior Rangers arrives and quietly meet with Farah as they hide behind some bushes. They notice the bird is cleaning an open area. Misunderstood of the situation, the Junior Rangers thought the bird need help of building a nest so they scatter around to find materials to give to the bird. As they try to give the bird the materials they gather, the bird gets upset and clean again. Confused of the situation, they then get greeted by Ranger Rocky.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Meera orders an extra-special teddy for her baby brother Nik and his teddy bears picnic.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: When the water tower falls across the train tracks at the station halt, it’s Pat’s job to pick it up using his helicopter and a giant super 3 magnet. The Magnet soon starts attracting objects - Alf’s spade, PC Selby’s hat, Pumpkin’s bridle, from all over Pencaster and Greendale. A chase ensues as Amy, Alf and PC Selby race to get their metal objects back from Pat. Pat needs to save the day and lift the water tower off the tracks before the Pencaster Flyer comes into the station…

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula and Bing tag all their favourite things around the house with stickers, but when Sula tags Hoppity Voosh Bing is upset because he doesnt want to share.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants Flop to read him a story when he has his bath but gets sad when his book gets wet. Flop helps him to understand that even though the book is wet, the story isnt.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has a great time choosing the perfect present for Sula in Padgets shop. Its a wand and is sparkly and flashy and spinny and Bing knows that she will love it. Bing is thrilled until it is time to hand the present over.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to try Coco’s Hula Hoop. It’s harder than it looks but he finds lots of other hoopy games as he tries. Just as Bing almost gets it right he gets carried away with spinning, trips over and breaks the hoop. Coco is upset that she can’t hula anymore until Bing and Charlie remind her of all the other games they can still do with the bent hoop.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are in the park playing at being giants and splashing in puddles with their big welly boots. As they play the puddles get bigger and bigger until Bing slips over in the mud and gets wet everywhere. Amma comes to the rescue with a giant warm bath and a giant carroty bagel.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: When Henry’s Cousin Louie comes to stay, Henry starts feeling homesick for the Frozen North. He decides there and then to go back with Cousin Louie and a sad Oswald goes round Big City to tell all of their friends. They gather at the bus stop to wish Henry bon voyage when suddenly a gust of wind takes the party balloons up into the air – along with Catrina! Everyone ends up hanging onto the balloons for dear life and Henry realises he has to make a choice - save his friends or catch the bus…

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: While housesitting for Henry, Daisy breaks his favourite fish vase. Oswald advises her to simply tell Henry what happened, but Daisy, worried that Henry will be angry with her, is sure theres another way out. She tries to mend the vase, buy a new one, and make a replica, but all her efforts fail. Daisy despairs, but Oswald reminds her that she has ruffled Henrys feathers many times before and they are still friends. Daisy confesses the truth to Henry only to discover he has an entire cupboard full of fish vases!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob announces there’s been a Spring City Clock Competition to design the new Spring City Clock – and guess who’s won? The Spring City Rockets! Bob shows the Machines their winning design and explains that metal figures will emerge and sound the bells on the clock. Wendy has been welding the metal figures together. Leo arrives and is looking forward to helping Bob with the decorative cladding around the clock tower but Bob tells him it’s Recycling Day today and his job is to take all the recycling to the Centre first. Bob and the Machines set off to the site while Leo and Muck gather up the boxes of recycling from around the Yard. But Leo is in such a hurry that he mistakes the box with the metal figures in for recycling and dumps it at the Recycling Centre.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Saffi has won a “Design a Statue” competition and now Bob and the team are turning her design into a water-fountain for the shopping mall. Saffi explains that her elephant statue design was based on her favourite toy, Mr Trunkers, but has since lost him. So when Muck is chosen to deliver the elephant statue, he promises to take extra special care of it for Saffi. But in his excitement, Muck accidentally knocks the elephant into a wall and scrapes off its paint. Muck can’t quite bring himself to own up to Saffi, so decides to tell Bob what has happened first. On his way to tell Bob, Muck overhears Anish telling Saffi how proud he is of her statue. Muck panics and ends up damaging the elephant more.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It is a sunny Spring day in the meadow and Little Nutbrown Hare is enjoying all it has to offer. As the day wears on a heavy grey cloud forces Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse to seek shelter from the rain. Will the friends let a little water ruin their fun or will they discover that rainy days can be just as exciting.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is disappointed when a trail of ants disappears with the delicious Spring berries he’s found. He’s convinced that ants are not very nice, and only after Big Nutbrown Hare explains how the ants were probably taking the berries home to their families does Little Nutbrown Hare forgive them. And when he sees how clever the ants are, he soon wants to be like them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The Summer meadow is home to a many amazing treasures of nature. When Little Nutbrown Hare finds a beautiful blue butterfly, he and Little Field Mouse go on a hunt for other blue treasures to bring back and show Big Nutbrown Hare, including blueberries, blue bells and even blue eggshells. Meanwhile, Big Nutbrown Hare has discovered the biggest blue treasure of them all. What could it be?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Each episode of centres around a narrative story, introducing key vocabulary and addressing specific learning outcomes, finishing with a reward dance to congratulate the viewer for completing the lesson.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: All the balls at Farmer Patrick Pigs new mini putt are disappearing. After much investigation Huckle and the gang track the missing balls to Patricks record breaking ‘egg laying’ chicken. / When the gold coins Mr Fix It finds on the beach disappear, Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to find out where they went.

programme.title: Messy Goes to Okido
programme.desc: When Messy accidentally sets Farmer Fuddles sheep loose, he must help round them up in time for their annual wool shearing. But will Messy be brave enough to get a fur-cut of his own?

programme.title: Messy Goes to Okido
programme.desc: Messy cant remember where he left his favourite sock. He goes to Okido and learns how to jog his memory, but when the rollercoaster breaks down, will he be able to help Stan Tall remember where he left his screwdriver?

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The continuing problem with the town’s power keeps the Berrykin crews digging and the girls from doing their work—especially frustrating Cherry, who is struggling to write a song. Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! The girls divide into two teams, each leaving clues for the other that lead to funny objects. The team that collects all the objects first, wins the grand prize—a bag of banana chips from Strawberry’s Cafe that look like gold coins. While the girls have fun, Berrykins Ed and Earl struggle to uncross the crossed juice cables under the cafe floor. The power problem has given the appliances a life of their own, resulting in Earl thinking the cafe is haunted!

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry returns from a day out at a theme park and finds that Steggy is missing.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry wants to grow some roses for Mothers day but he needs them to grow in just one day so he goes to Dino-World where flowers grow quickly.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers have a brush with a poacher as they try to return an Indian Star Tortoise to its home in the scrub forest.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: A storm is approaching and Skiff and Joe, the Lighthouse Keeper, patrol Arlesburgh, helping everyone to prepare for it. Duck and Oliver don’t think a ‘tiny little railboat’ should be out in a storm and it seems they are right when Skiff’s anchor rope snaps and his sail unfurls. Skiff is terrified as he gets blown down the track and right into a tree that lightning has brought down across the branchline. When Skiff realises that both Oliver and Duck are heading towards the tree he manages to raise his sail to warn them and avert a serious accident.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When the Fat Controller gives Daisy the job of conveying some special passengers up to the holiday town of Harwick, she gets carried away with the responsibility – deciding that, because she is a very special engine, they must be very special passengers! Not stopping for a group of children with sticky ice lollies and refusing to pull a dusty baggage truck results in the passengers not being able to perform their puppet show! Once the audience has been specially bussed in for the show, Daisy is humbled as she becomes a puppet stand for the performance of… a Punch And Judy puppet show!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Toramento is exhausted because of his job, so Grisu tries to help him by boosting a malfunctioning and slow cleaning robot to do the job in his place. But the boosted robot is not easy to control and makes a mess all around the city, also because Thingy wants to play with it, sending the machine haywire. Eventually Grisu understands that Toramento doesn’t need a robot doing the job in his place, but a care-giving device that provides coffee and massages, keeping his stamina up.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Checking the safety items at the watch tower in the forest, Emma realizes that the alarm system doesnt work anymore. Grisu suggest using the old fire station alarm bell. Great idea! Unfortunately, David, whos supposed to set it up, is called for an intervention and must leave. Grisu offers his help.Here is Grisu and Stella heading to the forest with the old bell on a cart. The noisy bell creates some confusion in the forest since everybody thinks theres a fire. Not mentioning Michel, Gertruds very talkative parrot who cant help but imitating every sound and voice he hears. The mission turns into a catastrophe when Grisu burns the bell… right when a fire starts into the forest. But Grisu is resourceful, as always, and he uses Michel as a spare alarm bell.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare And Little Field Mouse go on an adventurous journey through the woods in search of a special Autumn leaf. They leave a trail of acorns to find their way home, but Little Grey Squirrel unwittingly collects the acorns and leaves them all lost in the woods. Luckily he is able to help when he climbs to the treetops and spies the meadow in the distance.

programme.title: Richter, lenigme
programme.desc: Prokofievs 9th Sonata was dedicated to him, he played at Stalins funeral with Oistrakh and Rostropovitch and accompanied Schwarzkopf and Fischer-Dieskau: Sviatoslav Richter was THE Soviet pianist par excellence. This portrait, gives a view of life in Soviet Russia from the perspective of one of the greatest and yet most enigmatic world pianists.

programme.title: Verdi: I Lombardi alla prima crociata - Opera Royal de Wallonie-Liège
programme.desc: I Lombardi alla prima crociata | ‘Dramma lirico’ in four acts by Giuseppe Verdi (1813 – 1901) | Libretto by Temistocle Solera | First performance in Milan, Teatro alla Scala, February 11, 1843

programme.title: Jascha Heifetz - Le violoniste de Dieu
programme.desc: Not since Paganini had there been such a magician on the violin, a musical ‘wunderkind’ who went on to set the standards for nearly a century. Through home movies and personal family photos taken from 1903-1987, this documentary filmed in Vilna, Lithuania, Saint Petersburg, Russia, and in Los Angeles, re-creates a life that spanned the 20th Century.

programme.title: Rivalites musicales - Furtwangler contre Toscanini
programme.desc: Two men without whom the profession of conductor would not be what it is today. Two men who couldnt be more different from each other: Arturo Toscanini and Wilhelm Furtwangler. The former was rigorously faithful to the musical score, the latter conducted with radical subjectivity. In 1931 they both conducted at the Bayreuth Festival – for the first and last time. Soon the polite rivalry turned into bitter enmity. Both men were forced to take a stand on the regimes in their respective countries – and chose radically different paths. Toscanini, "the dictator", bravely challenged Mussolini; Furtwangler, a conservative, meanwhile proclaimed that art is always apolitical and reluctantly made a pact with the Nazis. The documentary not only opens up the different musical universes of the two great conductors by retracing their careers in Milan, Bayreuth and New York, but also raises a question that is more topical than ever: what has art to do with politics?Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Rachmaninov revisited
programme.desc: Celebrated in his day not only as a great composer, Sergei Rachmaninov was also admired as an outstanding pianist who was a peerless interpreter of his own works including the piano concerti and the Rhapsody on a Theme by Paganini.It is well known that he was in effect the sole pianist capable of performing his most demanding Third Piano Concerto and his performances and recording of the concerto came to be considered as the definitive ones. The relationship between performance, interpretation, and Rachmaninov’s own life is addressed in this film by young pianists. They explore the evolution of interpretation over the past few decades with brief excerpts of recordings by Rachmaninov as contrasted with contemporary performances by today’s well-known young pianists as they comment on the differences (or similarities) of their approach.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: The Sound Weavers: Ludovico Einaudi, Hauschka, Joep Beving, Hania Rani
programme.desc: Sold-out concerts, millions of albums sold to make the classical music industry green with envy: neoclassical, as the new musical trend is called, is a mega hit. What makes the form so popular? Is this music skillful or just comforting? Are its composers Mozart 2.0 or rather maestros for the masses?

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi undersoker episka byggmissar och avslojar orsakerna bakom katastrofen med bron i Baltimore. Darefter utforskar vi ett takras i en hollandsk fotbollsstadion, en skrammande kranbrand 45 våningar upp i Manhattan, skotska torn som inte foll vid en kontrollerad sprangning och ett trycktest i avloppssystemet som skickade en ”poonami” upp i den kinesiska himlen. Sedan ar det dags for en pint på Englands snedaste pub – Crooked House.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: På en spannande resa genom Tysklands storsta tekniska underverk avslojar vi den innovativa teknik som gor det mojligt for ingenjorer att bygga jarnvagslinjer 40 meter under Munchen. Darefter avslojar vi hemligheterna bakom en rekordbrytande svangbro over floden Ems, forundras over en båtlyft som transporterar lastfartyg genom luften och besoker den komplexa restaureringen av varldens hogsta kyrka.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: År 1945. Stalin utkampar ett utrotningskrig mot Nazityskland. På ostfronten stormar en miljon sovjetiska soldater mot Berlin. Men for att nå sitt mål måste Roda Armen besegra ett flertal tyska fasten i en serie slag som staller den sovjetiska militarmaktens storlek mot nazisternas teknik och strategi.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: År 1943: I mer an tre år har Hitlers invasionsarmeer rusat fram over Europas fastland. De allierade kan inte konkurrera på slagfaltet, varfor befalhavarna planerar en djarv attack mot den industri som framstaller tyskarnas stridsvagnar, ubåtar och flygplan. Man sammanfor sina flygvapens allra basta for att forsoka sig på ett av kriget mest djarva bombangrepp.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Utredningen av ett mystiskt flygplansvrak i de karibiska vattnen samt upptackten av en hemlig tunnel langs gransen mellan USA och Mexiko avslojar vilka extrema åtgarder som kartellerna ar beredda att ta till for att sakerstalla drogsmugglingen till olika delar av varlden. Har får vi direkt insikt i hur kartellerna bedriver sin ljusskygga verksamhet.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an en italiensk ikon, en Fiat 500 från 1967. Deras minsta projekt storleksmassigt men det ar en av de storsta utmaningarna. En rad familjetragedier har hindrat agaren från att fixa till bilen sjalv.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an en brittisk klassiker från 60-talet, en Sunbeam Alpine. Den tidigare agaren, fore detta mekanikern Ray, fick en hjarnskada som lamnade honom funktionshindrad.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Dokumentar som kartlagger några av de storsta undervattensaventyren under andra varldskriget med ubåtar, från uppkomsten av Wolfpack till kampen for seger i Stilla havet.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Oktober 1943. Efter att deras forsta krigspatrull slutar i konflikt och besvikelse måste en ny ubåtsbefalhavare overvinna meningsskiljaktigheter trots sina okonventionella val av nyckelroller. Under hans ledning arbetar besattningen tillsammans for att skapa fortroende aven nar de reser for att rikta in sig på fiendens sjofart i farliga japanska hemmavatten.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Kusterosion blottlagger skelettkvarlevor från medeltida flytande fangelser. En sarskild sorts spindel upptacks på en isolerad o. Arkeologer hittar bevis som skulle kunna klargora vad som hande med de forsvunna nybyggarna på Roanoke. Tusentals doda salar med markliga skruvkorkssår hittas i Kanada, vilket forbryllar experter.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Utredare forsoker komma fram till vad som hande ombord på PSA Flight 1771 efter att piloterna rapporterade skott från kabinen. 43 personer dog.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Flight 110 påborjar sin inflygning nar båda motorerna stannar och planet borjar falla. Piloterna startar om båda motorerna, men nastan omedelbart overhettas de vilket tvingar piloterna att stanga av dem. Planet faller snabbt, så piloterna overvager att landa planet i en kanal men valjer en grasplan istallet. Piloterna lyckas med en av historiens mest otroliga landningar inom kommersiell luftfart.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: Vissa jobb ar så stora att de kraver extra utrustning och expertis. Thord och Terje samarbetar med Bjoern for att flytta en lastbil med sjukvårdsprodukter. Darefter måste Bjoernx2 samarbeta nar de tar over en krasch från den ytterst upptagne Thord. Lite senare testas nykomlingen Terje på ett solouppdrag… bara for att upptacka att aven mindre uppdrag ibland kan krava ett extra par hander.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: Raddningsexperter for en kamp mot klockan for att frigora isiga norska vagar! En somnlos Thord får hjalp av Bjoern for att snabbt radda en dyrbar last lax. Jo Roger och Torstein befinner sig under press från polisen att frigora en huvudled i -23ºC. Darefter får Thord inte sova en sekund innan han tvingas ut till en okant farlig kurva som ar en tickande bomb for alla involverade.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett privatjet som fraktar affarsresenarer till Akron i Ohio kraschar in i ett bostadshus mindre an tre kilometer från startbanan, och samtliga nio ombord omkommer. Utredarna genomsoker vraket men finner få ledtrådar. Det vill saga tills man studerar radarinformationen och upptacker en oregelbunden nedstigning, en forbryllande fordrojning och en tragisk, perfekt storm.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: En tidig morgonflygning från Lexington, Kentucky, slutar i katastrof nar ett tvåmotorigt jetplan kor av plattan.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: Nar vinterkylan slår till beger sig Norges bargningsteam ut for att hjalpa de forsta offren: de massiva truckarna. I det har avsnittet med det basta från tidigare program ser vi hur ett litet misstag kan leda till att truckar på 50 ton slutar i diket som strandade valar. Att få upp dem igen ar en komplicerad och farlig historia, men nar dyrbar last står på spel måste raddningsoperationen gå vagen!

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: I over ett sekel har Jo Rogers familjeforetag hållit vagarna i Norges nordligaste vildmark oppna. Nu ar det dags for hans son Ole Henrik att bevisa att han har raddningsyrket i blodet. I det har avsnittet med det basta från tidigare program visar Jo Roger, Ole Henrik och kollegan Roger att det har familjeforetaget fortfarande har vad som kravs.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi får veta hur en kran kunde kollapsa ner i ett lugnt nederlandskt bostadsområde, och reser till Asien dar några av varldens storsta byggarbetsplatser misslyckas redan innan bygget ens borjat.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Vid en genomsokning av en farja i Puerto Rico hittar poliser flera resvaskor fyllda med kokain. På JFK-flygplatsen upptacker ett team guldsmycken varda en halv miljon dollar. Senare stoppar granspoliser flera resenarer som forsoker smuggla opioidtabletter over den sodra gransen.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Ett flyg på vag till Bali blir forsenat efter att en servicetruck kraschar in i dess landningsstall. Australiska granspolisen hittar olagliga vapen i en passagerares bagage. Oregistrerade taxichaufforer åker fast och det lacker bransle på landningsbanan. På natten landar ett mystiskt flygplan från sovjettiden utan forvarning.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter start skakas Japan Airlines 123 av två explosioner, och piloterna forsoker hålla kvar sin forsvagade 747 i skyn. Sedan planet kraschat in i ett berg blir den darur resulterande katastrofen historiens dodligaste enskilda flygolycka. Fastan utredarna omedelbart misstanker ett terrorattentat har vraket en annan historia att beratta – en som hotar att hålla samtliga varldens 747:or på marken.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna utnyttjar det ovanliga och valkomna mildvadret for att oka vinterns overlevnadschanser.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Vintern har anlant och och med den en brådska att samla in alla återstående fornodenheter. Efter några misslyckade jakter, beger sig Gary djupt in i vildmarken på jakt efter hjort. Curly hjalper sin van att hugga ner hennes forsta doda trad till brasved. Sam bygger en vedspis åt nykomlingen Amanda så att hon har en varmekalla på sin husbåt. Och Porters ber en av Alaskas pionjarer att overse deras vedstapel.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Vi foljer arkeologer som soker efter drottning Kleopatras grav. En grupp undervattensarkeologer dyker i Medelhavet for att utforska ruinerna av det forntida Alexandria. Ett annat team tar med några 4 000-åriga mumier till ett sjukhus for en rontgenundersokning. Vi får också folja med på en tur genom ett nyligen upptackt tunnelnatverk som kanske kan leda till den siste faraons sista viloplats!

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: I vastra kanten av Konungarnas dal ligger en av de sista outforskade gravarna i Egypten. Den amerikanske egyptologen Don Ryan kampar mot klockan for att utforska grav nr. 49. Hoppet ar att hitta vad antikens gravplundrare missat och han gor en dramatisk upptackt: en 3 000 år gammal ring som tillhort faraon Ramses III. Vi får aven veta mer om gravplundringens historia, från antiken och framåt.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP-poliser i San Diego upptacker en batteriladdare fylld med metamfetamin vart 14 500 dollar och stoppar ett fordon fullastat med metamfetamin och fentanyl vart 589 000 dollar. Samtidigt avslojar polisen på JFK-flygplatsen en samling uråldriga guldparlor, och i Miami griper CBP en resenar med ketamin for 37 500 dollar gomt i schampoflaskor, i ett forsok av HIS att gripa den avsedda mottagaren.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: HSI-agenter i Miami hittar 37 kilo kokain vart narapå två miljoner dollar gomt i en fiskleverans. CBP-poliser i San Diego stoppar ett flertal manniskosmugglingsforsok vid San Ysidro-gransen, och CBP:s jordbruksspecialister i Atlanta genomsoker passagerare i ett forsok att stoppa spridningen av destruktiva invasiva arter som kommer från forbjudna livsmedel.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Historien om hur nazisterna krigade på varldshaven har annu aldrig berattats. Vetenskapliga data kombineras med datorgrafik for att utreda Andra Varldskrigets forlorade vrak.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tar sig an en brittisk klassiker från 60-talet, en Sunbeam Alpine. Den tidigare agaren, fore detta mekanikern Ray, fick en hjarnskada som lamnade honom funktionshindrad.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz stoter på den brittiska sportbilen Caterham 7, en riktig drombil for amatorracerforare. Kan de hjalpa Jason att få igång den igen?

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Oktober 1943. Efter att deras forsta krigspatrull slutar i konflikt och besvikelse måste en ny ubåtsbefalhavare overvinna meningsskiljaktigheter trots sina okonventionella val av nyckelroller. Under hans ledning arbetar besattningen tillsammans for att skapa fortroende aven nar de reser for att rikta in sig på fiendens sjofart i farliga japanska hemmavatten.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: I februari 1945 får en amerikansk ubåtsbefalhavare order om att jaga japanska ubåtar med uppdrag att i hemlighet evakuera VIP-personer från Filippinerna. Deras uppdrag att skicka ner sina ubåtskollegor på havsbotten blir startskottet for en strid om taktik, smygande och risker som skulle satta rekord for den amerikanska flottan under andra varldskriget.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Övergivna byggnader och maskiner på en o nara Antarktis tyder på att manniskor har bott dar en gång i tiden. Storande ljud som horts av utlandska diplomater på Kuba satter igång forskning om ett mojligt globalt psykologiskt fenomen. Mystiska gummiliknande plattor från Indonesien dyker upp på europeiska strander. Ett markligt stenmonster som hittats i vattnet i Floridas nationalpark Dry Tortugas avslojar en sedan lange forsvunnen o.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Flight 110 påborjar sin inflygning nar båda motorerna stannar och planet borjar falla. Piloterna startar om båda motorerna, men nastan omedelbart overhettas de vilket tvingar piloterna att stanga av dem. Planet faller snabbt, så piloterna overvager att landa planet i en kanal men valjer en grasplan istallet. Piloterna lyckas med en av historiens mest otroliga landningar inom kommersiell luftfart.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Piloterna på SAS Flight 686 har nastan ingen sikt och forlitar sig helt på markledningen nar de rullar till sin startplats. Planet accelererar på banan, men nar det lyfter kolliderar det med ett Cessna-plan. Det ar den varsta olyckan i italiensk flyghistoria och utredningen avslojar chockerande misstag.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: På isiga vagar ar insatserna hoga nar vardefull last står på spel. Jo Roger och Ole Henrik måste transportera en last full med salt, samtidigt som de skyddar en viktig flod mot potentiella fororeningar. Bjoern och hans team riskerar livet for att radda lax. Lite senare måste Torstein och rookien Isac finna en prekar kraftbalans for att radda en dyr och narapå ny mjolktankbil undan forstorelse.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: Kvicktankthet och uppfinningsrikedom hjalper bogserarna att radda dagen. Thord och Torbjoern ringer en van med en kran. Jo Roger och Stig rensar ett vrak till ur vagen på vag mot sitt egentliga uppdrag: en fullastad glycerinbil. Som tur ar ger en narbelagen byggarbetsplats mer dragkraft i form av en gravskopa. Bjoern tvingas nasta offra sin personliga utrustning for att undsatta en bondes traktor.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: En tidig morgonflygning från Lexington, Kentucky, slutar i katastrof nar ett tvåmotorigt jetplan kor av plattan.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Indonesiska utredare måste ta reda på varfor en Boeing 737 Mx8 - ett av varldens bast saljande nya flygplan - kraschat i Javasjon.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue: Vagkaos!
programme.desc: Ice Road Rescue visar livsfarliga situationer dar extrema vaderforhållanden forvandlar raddningsuppdrag till en kamp mellan manniska och natur.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Raddningstjansten har får en ny fiende: det extrema vadret. Plotsliga temperaturforandringar ger våra israddare oforutsedda utmaningar.

programme.title: Lost Ships of WW2
programme.desc: Under en natt omkom over tusen allierade sjoman nar fyra kryssare gick under i lågor. De vilar på en gravplats som ar så full av skepp att den har fått namnet ”Iron Bottom Sound” (jarnbottens sund). Petrel ger sig ut på en omojlig uppgift for att hitta alla fyra skeppen.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: Juli 1943: En av historiens storsta stridsvagnsstrider inleds i det oppna stapplandskapet i sovjetiska Kursk. Hitler samlar omkring 800 000 nazistiska soldater for att inleda en formidabel attack i syfte att rikta ett forodande slag mot Stalin och slutligen utplåna Roda armen från jordens yta. I denna dodliga konfrontation stalls nazisternas elitvapen och taktik mot Sovjets industriella makt.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nu går eleverna in i andra fasen av luftstridsutbildningen – defensiv strid. Har satts deras formågor på prov nar de ska undvika att bli nedskjutna av erfarna instruktorer. Den fysiska påfrestningen blir for mycket for en av eleverna, medan en annan vacklar nar tidigare misslyckanden gor sig påminda. Allt står på spel.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Under en pendelflygning forlorar piloterna på ett tvåmotorigt plan båda sina motorer.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Vintern har anlant och och med den en brådska att samla in alla återstående fornodenheter. Efter några misslyckade jakter, beger sig Gary djupt in i vildmarken på jakt efter hjort. Curly hjalper sin van att hugga ner hennes forsta doda trad till brasved. Sam bygger en vedspis åt nykomlingen Amanda så att hon har en varmekalla på sin husbåt. Och Porters ber en av Alaskas pionjarer att overse deras vedstapel.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sam Carlson har våren i sikte nar han bygger ett nytt regnsystem, medan Mary Miller ger sig ut i skogen for att jaga fjallripa på egen hand.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: I vastra kanten av Konungarnas dal ligger en av de sista outforskade gravarna i Egypten. Den amerikanske egyptologen Don Ryan kampar mot klockan for att utforska grav nr. 49. Hoppet ar att hitta vad antikens gravplundrare missat och han gor en dramatisk upptackt: en 3 000 år gammal ring som tillhort faraon Ramses III. Vi får aven veta mer om gravplundringens historia, från antiken och framåt.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer utreder en av de storsta kvinnliga faraonerna – Hatshepsut, och bevis om kvinnors liv i det forntida Egypten.

programme.title: Ping Pong Family
programme.desc: Grunerløkka har Norges mest populære bordtennisbord. Men noen av entusiastene har et noe mer liberalt forhold til rus enn kommunen setter pris på.

programme.title: Hvor er Odin?
programme.desc: Odin sjekker inn på et hotellrom med fem andre gutter natta han forsvinner. Vet de noe som kan forklare forsvinningen?

programme.title: Vikingane
programme.desc: Varg blir hårsår når han blir oversett på grunn av hårtapet sitt. I Norheim prøver Olav å gjøre en mann av Orm ved å forlove ham med Frøya.

programme.title: Norges tøffeste
programme.desc: Fire deltakere står igjen, og alle er verdige finalister. Etter tre harde konkurranser får vi svaret på det alle lurer på: Hvem er Norges tøffeste?

programme.title: Våre beste år
programme.desc: Siri må tyde det mystiske brevet. Simone trues av FrP-Myksvoll og Svein får et tilbud som er for godt til å være sant.

programme.title: Våre beste år
programme.desc: Siri kjemper mot falske nyheter. Ole Martin trenger pene jenter til en musikkvideo, og Simone møter en sexy anarkist.

programme.title: Albert Åberg bit for bit
programme.desc: Kort tid før Albert fylte femti, gjekk skaparen hans bort. Familie, fans og vener teiknar eit fargerikt portrett av folkekjære Gunilla Bergstrom.

programme.title: Alkoholeksperimenta
programme.desc: Sjølv små mengder alkohol kan gjere skade, viser det seg. Men kan det også vere sunt? Og kan eit nytt molekyl gjere deg sånn passe full – utan risiko?

programme.title: Superkrefter
programme.desc: Skammen etter en audition på skolen sitter ennå i Rick. Kan han få hjelp av hypnose til å synge på scenen igjen?

programme.title: Helt Ramme sporter
programme.desc: Birk Ruud og Nicolay flytter sjakkbrikker og slår hverandre helseløse foran hundrevis av blodtørstige engelskmenn i en dunkel kjellerarena i London.

programme.title: På innsiden av e-sport
programme.desc: Man kan få inntrykk av at pengene flyter i e-sportverdenen. Men er det mulig å jukse seg til de store premiene?

programme.title: På innsiden av e-sport
programme.desc: De mest prestisjetunge turneringene foregår på LAN. Premiene er større og sikkerheten sies å være høyere. Men hvor sikre er de egentlig?

programme.title: På innsiden av e-sport
programme.desc: Hadde e-sporten tjent på å definere seg selv som kultur fra starten?

programme.title: Made in Korea: The K-Pop Experience
programme.desc: Blaise strever med å finne plassen sin i gruppa. Gutane får prøve seg på noko av det viktigste for alle k-pop-band – musikkvideoen.

programme.title: Vikingane
programme.desc: Varg blir hårsår når han blir oversett på grunn av hårtapet sitt. I Norheim prøver Olav å gjøre en mann av Orm ved å forlove ham med Frøya.

programme.title: Vikingane
programme.desc: Orm velger forlover med omhu og arrangerer et kreativt utdrikningslag. Kark finner ut hvor han stammer fra, og Liv foretar en enorm klassereise.

programme.title: Humoretaten
programme.desc: Slåsskamp på lekeland, mobilsnok Haaland, venninneklining, «frakken min?» og nordnorske Trump hater turister.

programme.title: Superkrefter
programme.desc: Skammen etter en audition på skolen sitter ennå i Rick. Kan han få hjelp av hypnose til å synge på scenen igjen?

programme.title: Ville familier
programme.desc: Brann tvinger en tapirfamilie på flukt, mens en krabbemor bygger basseng til sine små. En kompleks verden som jungelen krever smarte løsninger.

programme.title: Etter Benjamin
programme.desc: Holmlia lammes av nok et tap, og håpet settes på prøve. Elias forstår at hatet som drepte Benjamin, fortsatt lever.

programme.title: Etter Benjamin
programme.desc: Rettssaken nærmer seg. Elias er hovedvitne, mens Espen søker tilgivelse. Marit, Payam og resten av Holmlia kjemper for at Benjamin aldri skal glemmes.

programme.title: Studentmorderen i Idaho
programme.desc: Kriminologi-studenten Bryan Kohberger (28) står tiltalt for brutalt å ha knivdrept fire av sine medstudenter i Idaho, og risikerer dødsstraff.

programme.title: Det sit i veggane
programme.desc: Ein gong var huset til Thomas og Katarina bustad for trompetisten i hæren. I historia til huset finst ei frykteleg augevitneskildring frå slagmarka.

programme.title: Afrika med Afua
programme.desc: Fra afrobeats til Nollywood – med høy energi og store ambisjoner slår unge kulturutøvere seg frem i Nigeria.

programme.title: Vikingane
programme.desc: Orm velger forlover med omhu og arrangerer et kreativt utdrikningslag. Kark finner ut hvor han stammer fra, og Liv foretar en enorm klassereise.

programme.title: Úrval vikunnar 11. okt - Vika 41
programme.desc: Haraldur F. Gíslason, formaður felags leikskolakennara, og Solveig Anna Jonsdottir, formaður Eflingar, ræða deilurnar sem hafa magnast um leikskolann og Halla Gunnarsdottir formaður VR og Sigríður Ingibjorg Ingadottir hagfræðingur BSRB gera það sama. Finnbjorn A. Hermannsson forseti ASÍ furðar sig á hávaxtastefnu Seðlabankans og hagfræðingarnir Þorsteinn Þorgeirsson og Þorvaldur Gylfason og sagnfræðingurinn Sveinn Máni Johannesson ræða Donald Trump og Bjarni Randver Sigurvinsson trúarbragða- og guðfræðingur ræðir áhrif evangelískrar kirkju á stefnu ríkisstjornar Trump. Salvor Nordal, umboðsmaður barna, segir margt að varast fyrir born og og ungmenni í samtímanum og Valur Ingimundarson professor ræðir vaxandi stríðsogn í Evropu. Hilmar Þor Hilmarsson professor ræðir vopnahle á Gaza og oryggismál Evropu, Helga Þorolfsdottir, serfræðingur í friðarfræðum, ræðir hernaðarhyggju og hervæðingu og Stefán Pálsson, stjornarmaður í Samtok hernaðarandstæðinga ser enga ástæðu til að Íslendingar vopnvæðist. Nýr þáttur byrjaði á Samstoðinni, Staða mála: Petur Eggerz las pistilinn og ræddi við Moggu Stínu. Guðmundur Andri Thorsson rithofundur, Jona Hlíf Halldorsdottir myndlistarmaður og Bjorn Leví Gunnarsson, fyrrum þingmaður, ræddu listamannalaun og Greta Kristín Ómarsdottir leikstjori og leikararnir Bjarni Snæbjornsson, Árni Petur Guðjonsson og Kristrún Kolbrúnardottir ræddu Skamm­ar­þrí­hyrn­ing­inn, komískam politískan leik um vok og anti-vok.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Bandarísk þáttaroð frá Emmy-verðlaunahafanum Lena Waithe. Lífið í suðurhluta Chicago tekur á sig ýmsar myndir. Þættir sem hafa hlotið mikið lof gagnrýnenda.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Bandarískur spennuþáttur um liðsmenn bandarísku alríkislogreglunnar, FBI, í New York. Frábær þáttaroð frá Dick Wolf, framleiðanda Law And Order og Chicago þáttaraðanna.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Bandarísk þáttaroð um liðsmenn bandarísku alríkislogreglunnar, FBI, sem eltast við hættulegustu glæpamenn Bandaríkjanna.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Bandarísk þáttaroð með Nathan Fillion (Castle) í aðalhlutverki. Hann leikur John Nolan, sem ákveður að breyta til í lífi sínu þegar hann er orðinn 45 ára og gerast logreglumaður. Hann er elsti nýliðinn í logreglunni í Los Angeles.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Skemmtilegir þættir um Madeline Matlock, logfræðing sem snýr aftur til starfa eftir þo nokkurt hle.

programme.title: From
programme.desc: Dulmognuð þáttaroð frá somu framleiðendum og gerðu Lost. Þættirnir gerast í smábæ, í mið vestur Bandaríkjunum, sem heldur ollum íbúum og þeim sem eiga leið hjá í gíslíngu. Ekki við hæfi barna.

programme.title: Tonlist
programme.desc: Bandarísk gamanþáttaroð með Cedric the Entertainer í aðalhlutverki. Hann leikur fjolskyldufoður í rotgronu hverfi blokkumanna í Los Angeles sem bregður í brún þegar hann kynnist nýju nágronnunum.

programme.title: Tonlist
programme.desc: Bandarísk gamanþáttaroð með Cedric the Entertainer í aðalhlutverki. Hann leikur fjolskyldufoður í rotgronu hverfi blokkumanna í Los Angeles sem bregður í brún þegar hann kynnist nýju nágronnunum.

programme.title: Love Island
programme.desc: Bráðskemmtileg raunveruleikasería þar sem eldheitir einstaklingar fá tækifæri til að finna ástina í fjorugum leik.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Dramatísk þáttaroð sem segir frá fjolskyldu sem býr á búgarði í Alberta fylkinu í Kanada og lífi þeirra saman í gegnum súrt og sætt.

programme.title: Man With A Plan
programme.desc: Adam kemst að því að það er erfiðara en að segja það að ala upp þrjú ung born sín. Þegar konan hans fer aftur að vinna kemst hann að því að nýja starfsskylda hans heima við hans se erfiðari en hann bjost við. En hann gefst ekki upp.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Bandarísk gamanþáttaroð með Cedric the Entertainer í aðalhlutverki. Hann leikur fjolskyldufoður í rotgronu hverfi blokkumanna í Los Angeles sem bregður í brún þegar hann kynnist nýju nágronnunum.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug cannot spend time with Carrie on Valentines Day, because he has to deliver penguins, with Deacon, from one zoo to another. Yet, along the way, they run into some mishaps. Meanwhile, Carrie and Holly go out and give her tips with men to look for a man for Hall. However, Carrie inadvertently fixes her up with her boss. Also when Arthur and Spence go to up a pick a date for the holiday, he accidentally gets himself a date that is old enough to be his grandmother.

programme.title: Handboltahollin BEINT
programme.desc: Horður Magnússon stýrir þætti um íslenskan handbolta. Farið er yfir nýjustu leikina og fjallað um liðin og leikmenn deildanna. Horður verður með handboltaserfræðinga ser til halds og trausts auk þess sem goðir gestir kíkja í heimsokn.
